title: Build Responsible AI using Error Analysis toolkit
description:
Error Analysis, a new Responsible AI open source toolkit, enables machine learning practitioners to identify model errors and diagnose the root causes behind these errors, helping to build responsible, reliable, and trusted solutions.
Jump to: 
[00:00] Livestream begins
[01:24] About AI models 
[02:37] Error analysis
[04:23] Interpretability and fairness
[06:34] About Error Analysis toolkit 
[11:46] Error explorer demo 
[22:18] Debugging demos - Global and Local explanations
